TopicTitle: Launch clamps respawn on my craft after launch

Articles.Content:
A really large rocket I have has trouble because the launch clamps respawn every 10 seconds or so during flight and immediately fall off sometimes striking the side of my rocket and causing damage.

- - - Updated - - -

anybody else seen this?
Yeah its a stock bug, try http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-4-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-4c-1-22-Aug-15%29
